keys: mammifères, placentalia, rongeur, Amérique du sud
mamíferos, placentalia, roedor, Ámérica do Sul

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>aae1e6c1-069d-4899-aefb-52c96558e1b4#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Vízidisznó</string>
            <string language="en">Water hog</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserschwein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Porc de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porco da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Maiale dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γουρούνι ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cerdo del agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A világ legnagyobb termetű rágcsálója, tömege elérheti a 70 kg-ot. Dél-Amerika vizes, mocsaras területeinek lakója.</string>
            <string language="en">The world's biggest statured rodent, its mass can reach the 70 kg. Inhabitant of watery moorlands of South America.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  rágcsáló,  Dél-Amerika,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, placentalia, rodent, South America</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der größten Welt statured Nagetier, seine Masse
kann die 70 Kilogramm erreichen. Einwohner der wäßrigen 
moorlands von Südamerika.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le monde plus grand statured le rongeur, sa masse
peut atteindre les 70 kilogrammes. Habitant des bruyères 
aqueuses de l'Amérique du sud.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O mundo o mais grande statured o roedor, sua 
massa pode alcançar os 70 quilogramas. Habitante de moorlands 
aquosos de Ámérica do Sul.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il mondo più grande statured il roditore, la 
relativa massa può raggiungere i 70 chilogrammi. Abitante dei 
moorlands acquosi del Sudamerica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κόσμος ο μεγαλύτερος το τρωκτικό, η μάζα της μπορεί
να φθάσει στα 70 κλ. Κάτοικος υδατώδη moorlands της 
Νότιας Αμερικής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El mundo más grande statured el roedor, su masa 
puede alcanzar los 70 kilogramos. Habitante de moorlands acuosos
de Suramérica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, placentalia, Nagetier, Südamerika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, placentalia, rongeur, Amérique du sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, placentalia, roedor, Ámérica do Sul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, placentalia, roditore, Sudamerica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, placentalia, τρωκτικό, Νότια Αμερική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, placentalia, roedor, Suramérica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
